resources.string: This activity is for displaying and managing playlists the user has saved. To make this screen work the users preferences need to be saved, can use sharedPref or Intents with key value pairs.
This activity is for streaming music content from various sources. A mediaPlayer will need to be implemented and its source needs to be able to be set to the chosen stream source.
This activity is for viewing the users library of songs. Can access the users media files by launching the file explorer with an intent, and get the media URI in onActivityResult.
This activity is a store for buying music downloads.Need to be able to access an online store. The in app billing service can be used to achieve some of this functionality.
This activity is for altering the applications settings. Can use sharedPref to save preferences.
This activity is for displaying the latest trending music. Download a info to populate a listView.
